sentence.Network_en: The new musical was visually and aurally appealing.
sentence.Network_cn: 这部新的音乐剧在视觉和听觉上都很吸引人.

sentence.Network_en: The performance is aurally and visually exciting.
sentence.Network_cn: 这场表演是一场视、听的飨宴.

sentence.Network_en: Radio can't dazzle us with visual spectacles, it has to capture and hold our attention aurally.
sentence.Network_cn: 广播不可能用壮观的画面使我们倾倒, 它只能通过听觉效果吸引我们.
